pages.text: It's important to take care of your mental health. The lower your $(#00a8a8)sanity$() is, the more $(d)unpleasant side effects$() you may experience. Low sanity can not only lead to $(#00a800)paranoia, fear and hallucinaions$(), but it can $(d)make monsters more aggressive$().

You can $(#00a800)lose sanity$() through the following:$(li) Being in the dark$(li) Being near hostile creatures$(li) Being overly hungry or tired$(li) Getting hurt$(li) Hurting animals$(li) Having a pet die$(li) Having your movement restrained$(li) Holding or using certain items, or wearing certain types of armor

You can $(#00a800)regain sanity$() through the following:$(li) Eating certain foods or drinks$(li) Having a nearby pet$(li) Sleeping$(li) Fishing$(li) Being near certain blocks, like Campfires$(li) Earning advancements$(li) Trading with villagers$(li) Breeding and shearing animals

Your $(#00a8a8)alignment$() and $(#00a8a8)Insight$() will also affect your sanity. High insight will provide a passive regeneration to your sanity - but beware, because the higher your insight, the more sanity you lose when it goes down.$(br2)Positive alignment will grant a passive buff to your sanity, and negative alignment will slowly drain it.
